alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 11:47PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Erie County through 1230 AM EDT... At 1147 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North East, or 10 miles east of Erie, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Erie, Corry, North East, Wattsburg, Northwest Harborcreek, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville and Northwest Harborcr. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
